description: Try our easy to follow Asparagus Salad With Lemon Vinaigrette recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Asparagus Salad With Lemon Vinaigrette Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange lettuce, asparagus, snow peas and radish on a platter. Scatter over feta, drizzle with dressing, top with basil and almonds, then serve.
